name: Of False Gods and Mad Kings
name_original: Of False Gods and Mad Kings
description:
Manila, 1972,
Martial Law has just been declared. Peace and order have been restored and civil unrest has been quelled...

Or has it indeed?

As a member of the press, how far are you willing to go to keep the public informed about the truth? With danger around every corner, who can you trust? Step into the shoes of Leonora Marasigan and see what it was like to be a journalist during one of the most pivotal periods in Philippine history.

Year and term of capstone: 
Capstone1, 2nd Term, AY 2016

Team members: 
Cyril Benedict Dumdum
Marco Raphael Rabat
Mohammed Idris
Derrick Austin Angeles
Anjelica Cabrera

Recognition: 
Best Capstone 1 (DLS-CSB, Nov. 2016)
GameOn 2017 Nominee for Best Gameplay
